{"reasoning": "The functional equation $f(x) + f(y) = f(x+1) + f(y-1)$ implies that the difference $f(z+1) - f(z)$ is constant for all integers $z$. Let this constant be $k$. Rearranging the equation gives $f(x+1) - f(x) = f(y) - f(y-1)$, confirming $k$ is constant. Thus, $f$ is linear: $f(z) = kz + c$.

Using the given values $f(2016) = 6102$ and $f(6102) = 2016$:
$$
\begin{cases}
2016k + c = 6102 \\
6102k + c = 2016
\end{cases}
$$
Subtracting the first equation from the second:
$$
(6102 - 2016)k = 2016 - 6102 \implies 4086k = -4086 \implies k = -1.
$$
Thus, $h = k + 5 = -1 + 5 = 4$.

The grid to tile is $4 \times 4n$. The given tetromino (from the Asymptote code) is the T-tetromino, which covers 4 squares.
